inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of IC of the bladder
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to catheterize through urethra or stoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to travel for quarterly urine cultures
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs and is able to catheterize through a stoma. However, the patient's ability to travel for quarterly urine cultures and have an informed other available is unknown.
